{% verbatim %}

Module client (v1.16.0)

Parent client for calling the Cloud BigQuery Storage API.

This is the base from which all interactions with the API occur.

Classes

BigQueryReadClient

BigQueryReadClient(*, credentials: typing.Optional[google.auth.credentials.Credentials] = None, transport: typing.Optional[typing.Union[str, google.cloud.bigquery_storage_v1beta2.services.big_query_read.transports.base.BigQueryReadTransport]] = None, client_options: typing.Optional[google.api_core.client_options.ClientOptions] = None, client_info: google.api_core.gapic_v1.client_info.ClientInfo = <google.api_core.gapic_v1.client_info.ClientInfo object>)

Client for interacting with BigQuery Storage API.

The BigQuery storage API can be used to read data stored in BigQuery.

BigQueryWriteClient

BigQueryWriteClient(*, credentials: typing.Optional[google.auth.credentials.Credentials] = None, transport: typing.Optional[typing.Union[str, google.cloud.bigquery_storage_v1beta2.services.big_query_write.transports.base.BigQueryWriteTransport]] = None, client_options: typing.Optional[google.api_core.client_options.ClientOptions] = None, client_info: google.api_core.gapic_v1.client_info.ClientInfo = <google.api_core.gapic_v1.client_info.ClientInfo object>)

BigQuery Write API. The Write API can be used to write data to BigQuery.
